mapper.select: SELECT sh.id as id, c.scrip as scrip, sh.total_buy_quantity as totalBuyQuantity, sh.total_sell_quantity as totalSellQuantity, sh.total_buy_amount as totalBuyAmount, sh.total_sell_amount as totalSellAmount, sh.holding_quantity as holdingQuantity, sh.current_investment as currentInvestment, CASE WHEN sh.holding_quantity = 0 THEN 0 WHEN sh.total_sell_amount - sh.total_buy_amount > 0 THEN 0 ELSE sh.wacc END AS wacc FROM stock_holdings sh INNER JOIN companies c on sh.company_id = c.id ORDER BY c.scrip;
